sentences.english: Last summer, a hailstorm damaged the ten mu of good land.
sentences.chinese: 冰雹毀壞了農作物，甚至打死了牲畜。

sentences.english: Ashfalls can suffocate plants and poison livestock.
sentences.chinese: 降落的火山灰能悶死植物，毒害牲畜。

sentences.english: More trade in livestock helps to pass along nasties too.
sentences.chinese: 牲畜買賣的頻繁也幫助了病毒的傳播。

sentences.english: And they took their cattle, and their goods, which they had gotten in the land of Canaan, and came into Egypt, Jacob, and all his seed with him
sentences.chinese: 他們又帶着迦南地所得的牲畜，貨財來到埃及。

sentences.english: Livestock in the tens of thousands has been lost.
sentences.chinese: 數以萬計的牲畜頃刻間消失。

sentences.english: These herding dogs help move and protect the animals.
sentences.chinese: 這些牧羊犬可以驅趕並保護這些牲畜。

sentences.english: Intake of dry matter is also impaired by this lower digestibility .
sentences.chinese: 牲畜所採食的幹物質數量會因可消化性差而減少。

sentences.english: Heavy snow wreaks havoc in northwest China, destroying livestock and blocking roads. Michaela Cabrera reports.
sentences.chinese: 大雪肆虐中國西北部，凍死大量牲畜，阻塞了道路。

sentences.english: The stems, the leaves, you make fodder for livestock.
A righteous man regardeth the life of his beast: but the tender mercies or the wicked are cruel.
sentences.chinese: 義人顧惜牲畜的生命主，惡人都是殘暴不仁。

sentences.english: Public health experts observed antibiotic-resistant bacteria growing in these animals.
sentences.chinese: 公共衛生專家在這些牲畜中發現了抗生素耐藥細菌。

sentences.english: A natural outbreak of hoof and-mouth disease devastated the livestock industry in the United Kingdom a few years ago.
sentences.chinese: 幾年前在英國自然爆發的口蹄疫疾病破壞了牲畜業。

sentences.english: The European Union banned growth-promoting uses of antibiotics in livestock in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 歐盟在2006年禁止抗生素在促進牲畜生長的使用。

sentences.english: First we stopped all movement of animals within the village.
sentences.chinese: 我們首先停止村內所有牲畜的移動。

sentences.english: So God has taken away your father's cattle and has given them to me.
sentences.chinese: 天主這樣將你們父親的牲畜奪來了給我。

sentences.english: Store-fed animals are fed on maize, wheat and barley in the race to fatten them up as fast as possible.
sentences.chinese: 圈養牲畜則是用玉米小麥和大麥儘快的催肥而成的。

definition: animals used for their physical strength (mules, oxen etc)/beast of burden
oxen and horses/beasts of burden/CL:隻|只[zhi1]
